docs.abstract: Center for Science in Public Interest executive director Michael F Jacobson letter notes November 1 article on Coca-Cola's global crisis failed to discuss health impact of its products and marketing (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''Global Crisis for Coca-Cola, or a Pause That Refreshes?'' (Nov. 1), looked at the management style of the company's chairman and chief executive, M. Douglas Ivester. But it lacked any discussion of the health impact of the soda giant's products and marketing.
